narrative.title: Cirene Division - 1940Q2
narrative.situation: Italian Metropolitan Infantry Division (Binary) deployed in North Africa during 1940Q2.
narrative.objectives: Static defense of Eastern Cyrenaica sector, manning fortified positions along Egyptian border
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal desert (Eastern Cyrenaica) - rocky plateau, escarpments, limited water

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Metropolitan division with full peacetime training
Permanently stationed in Libya since pre-war period
Familiar with local terrain and defensive positions

environment.terrain_type: Coastal desert (Eastern Cyrenaica) - rocky plateau, escarpments, limited water
